department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supply and deliver Licensed Accommodations Booking Software
description: Supply and deliver Licensed Accommodations Booking Software with Maintenance and Support Services to the Department of National Defence, 19 Wing Comox, Lazo BC Canada in accordance with the requirement detailed herein.
full_summary:
================================
W0133-21T025: Accommodations Booking Software
------------------------------------------

### Solicitation Details

*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3799446566
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Publication Date:** January 25, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 1, 2023, at 14:00 EST
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 5, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** April 4, 2024

### Tender Status

*   **Status:** Expired  
*   **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal  
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding  
*   **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price  

### Contracts Description

The Government of Canada requires the supply and delivery of Licensed Accommodations Booking Software with Maintenance and Support Services to the Department of National Defence, 19 Wing Comox, Lazo, BC, Canada.

### End User and Regions of Delivery

*   **End User:** Department of National Defence (DND)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia

### Trade Agreements and Procurement Category

*   **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)

### Contact Information

*   **Contracting Authority:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Person:** Hélène Kobenter
*   **Email:** [helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:helene.kobenter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
